:: Wolfgang ::

Wait, if there's a battle going on, and the alliance is involved, then how 
dare you three just sit around here doing nothing?  It's my duty as the 
co-lead... ....loyal alliance member to get out there and kill the enemy, or 
die trying.

:: Walks toward the door ::
